name: Hull Breach Scaffold
description: Placeholder scaffold for Hull Breach Vol. 1 campaign content. All text is original placeholder — fill in with actual module content.
author: Scaffold

metadata.setting: Deep space station with failing systems

docking_bay.name: Docking Bay Alpha
docking_bay.description: A cavernous hangar with flickering emergency lights. Cargo containers are scattered haphazardly. The main airlock shows signs of forced entry.

corridor_a.name: Main Corridor A
corridor_a.description: A long corridor connecting the docking bay to the crew quarters. The overhead lights sputter. Dark stains mark the walls.

crew_quarters.name: Crew Quarters
crew_quarters.description: Rows of personal bunks, most ransacked. Personal effects litter the floor. A terminal flickers with an unread message.

medbay.name: Medical Bay
medbay.description: Sterile white surfaces now splattered with something dark. Medical equipment is overturned. The autodoc hums in standby mode.

command_deck.name: Command Deck
command_deck.description: The nerve center of the station. Multiple screens display warning messages. The captain's chair is empty, a sidearm holstered to its arm.

cargo_hold.name: Cargo Hold B
cargo_hold.description: Massive storage area filled with sealed crates. Something skitters in the darkness between the containers. Temperature is dropping.

reactor_room.name: Reactor Core
reactor_room.description: The station's fusion reactor pulses with an irregular rhythm. Warning klaxons sound periodically. Radiation levels are elevated.

dock_worker_jenkins.name: Jenkins
dock_worker_jenkins.description: A dock worker hiding behind cargo containers. Terrified, covered in grime. Knows what happened but is barely coherent.

creature_alpha.name: Specimen Alpha
creature_alpha.description: A biomechanical horror that nests in the medbay. Multiple limbs, acidic blood. It has been feeding on medical supplies.

creature_beta.name: Cargo Lurker
creature_beta.description: A smaller creature that moves between cargo containers. Fast, ambush predator. Vulnerable to fire.

station_ai.name: ARIA
station_ai.description: The station's AI system. Damaged but functional. May help or hinder depending on crew actions. Knows the reactor status.

investigate_signal.name: Investigate the Distress Signal
investigate_signal.description: The crew received a garbled distress signal from Station Omega-7. Dock and determine what happened to the crew.
objectives: Access the station logs from the Command Deck

stabilize_reactor.name: Stabilize the Reactor
stabilize_reactor.description: The reactor is approaching critical. If it fails, the station loses life support. Someone needs to reach the reactor core and perform a manual override.
objectives: Pass an Intellect check to assess the damage
Perform manual override (Mechanical Repair or Engineering)

clear_medbay.name: Clear the Medical Bay
clear_medbay.description: The medbay is infested. The autodoc is needed for treating injuries but Specimen Alpha has claimed the space.
objectives: Defeat or drive off Specimen Alpha

station_crew.name: Station Omega-7 Survivors
station_crew.description: The remaining crew of the station, scattered and terrified. Jenkins is the first one found.

the_specimens.name: The Specimens
the_specimens.description: Biological entities that have overrun the station. Origin unknown — possibly escaped from a research lab.

corporate.name: Stellaris Corp
corporate.description: The corporation that owns the station. Their true motives for the research conducted here are unclear.

station_map.name: Station Omega-7 Schematic
station_map.description: A partial map of the station layout. Some sections are marked as 'RESTRICTED'.

reactor_override_key.name: Reactor Override Key
reactor_override_key.description: A physical key needed to perform the manual reactor override. Last seen on the captain's person.

entries.description: Power flickers — all lights go out for 1d10 rounds.
entries.effect: Darkness. All checks at disadvantage without a light source.

entries.description: Strange noise echoes through the corridors.
A sealed door hisses open on its own.
entries.effect: New area accessible. Roll for encounter.

entries.description: Emergency broadcast plays on loop — a voice pleading for help.
entries.effect: All characters gain 1 stress. May reveal clue.

entries.description: You find a supply cache behind a loose panel.
entries.effect: Gain 1d3 random supplies from basic equipment list.

entries.description: Hull groans and shudders — micro-breach detected nearby.
entries.effect: Body save or take 1d10 damage from decompression.

entries.description: Something is watching from the vents. You catch a glimpse of movement.

entries.effect: Add weapon: Flare Gun (1d10, nearby, 2 shots, fire damage).

entries.description: Standard-issue sidearm with half a magazine.

entries.effect: Contains intel about the specimens. Key plot item.
